review: Much more useful than my Apple TV. Get this if you are a prime member!!

review: Based on product description, my expectations were higher.  It's not substantially different than Google Chromecast.  While the hardware itself may be better than Chromecast, the user interface is slightly worse.  My kids were unimpressed with Fire TV -- they generally skip FireTV in favor of Chromecast.
